level.text: Each person who fails to comply with any of the provisions of this chapter, prevents any inspection authorized by this chapter, or keeps inaccurate records shall be punished by a fine not to exceed five thousand dollars ($5,000).
Each violation of, or failure to comply with, this chapter shall constitute a separate offense and the penalties described in ยง 914.1 shall be applicable to each separate offense.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Section 3(a) of the Clean Fuel Fleet Vehicle Program and Alternative Fuels Incentives Amendment Act of 1994, D.C. Law 10-201, 41 DCR 7178, 7195 (November 4, 1994).
